newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: FORECAST - Dutch company results April 7-11.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Dutch company results April 7-11.

text.p: Analysts' estimates of Dutch company results for the week of April 7-11:
10/4 Stad R'dam YR 96 net ord ops 155 153/157 133
10/4 NBM Amstel YR 96 net ord ops 79 70/83 41
NOTES - Profit figures exclude extraordinary items and are in millions of guilders unless otherwise stated. They are stated before deduction of preference dividends where applicable.
* NBM Amstelland profit estimates for 1996 include a preference dividend of 27.3 million guilders which is being paid for the first time this year.
REUTER INSTRUMENT CODES (RICs) for other companies mentioned in the table: Stad Rotterdam.
FORECASTS CONTRIBUTED BY: Amstgeld, Bangert Pontier, Delta Lloyd Bank, Generale Bank, ING, Kempen & Co, Van Lanschot, Rabo/IRIS, SNS Securities, Wesselius.
